labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify the count of kids' t-shirts on the product page

name: Goto T shirt page and verify T shirt count

statusDetails.message: Title count and category count are not the same. expected [48158] but found [48221]

description: This test navigates to the kids' t-shirt page and verifies the title count matches the category count.

steps.name: Launching the browser and navigating to Myntra.
Verifying that title count matches the category count.
